content.text: Doing well, thanks! I'm a chef myself, and I love coming up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I'm not a chef, but I love cooking. I always try to come up with new recipes.
Do you have any favorites that you like to make?
I love making pasta dishes. I also like making soups and stews.
Those are both great options! I love making pasta dishes too.
What's your favorite kind of pasta?
I like spaghetti and penne. I also like making ravioli.
I like all kinds of pasta! I also like making gnocchi.
Gnocchi is really good! I haven't made it in a while.
You should try making it again! It's not too hard to make.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about cooking.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to do.
